headline: Billionaire David Tepper Bought More Shares of This Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stock That Could Join Apple, Microsoft, and Nvidia in the $3 Trillion Club by 2030
summary: Fund manager David Tepper increased his stake in Meta Platforms in the first quarter.  The company's AI-related work is already producing results, but the best is yet to come.  Meta Platforms could beat the market in the next five years, even as it faces some obstacles.
